data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Melo, Marcelo R. S. (2008): The genus Kali Lloyd (Chiasmodontidae: Teleostei) with description of new two species, and the revalidation of K. kerberti Weber. Zootaxa 1747: 1-33, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181658
